name: Midnight Ghost Hunt
description:
MIDNIGHT GHOST HUNT IS A MULTIPLAYER HIDE AND SEEK GAME THAT PITS A TEAM OF GHOSTS AGAINST A TEAM OF GHOST HUNTERS.
Ghost players have the ability to transform into household furniture and hide in plain sight.
At the stroke of Midnight, the Hunt begins! The Ghosts must survive until the time runs out.
The Ghosts may also attempt to gather Ectoplasm and sabotage the Ghost Hunter’s energy source to force an early victory, although this is risky.
The team of Ghost Hunters must work together to protect the energy source and eliminate all hidden Ghosts in the area before the time runs out.
